m_szDocSumamry: Clean tech a priority issue as Chinese president lands in US Gene Johnson and Phuong Le associated Press Published 12:44 am, Sunday, June 12, 2016 Image 1of/3 Buy photo Chinese President Xi Jinping, left, and his wife Peng Liyuan exit their aircraft upon arriving Tuesday, Sept. 22, 2015, at Boeing Field in Everett, Wash. Xi is spending three days in Seattle before traveling to Washington, D.C., for a White House state dinner on Friday.
